content: this flirty scarf features a bobble stitch on front prominent and back subtle that resembles little rosebuds when knit in assigned pooling yarns the placement of the pattern stitch is mostly determined by the color pops in the yarn which creates that just one more row excitement originally designed for the 2024 puget sound lys tour with a special assigned pooling yarn color yarn hazel knits lively dk - 1 skein rose garden 1 - available here 2 1 https //www hazelknits com/rose-garden-lively-dk/ 2 https //www hazelknits com/rose-garden-lively-dk/
